name: Avoid large Classes - too many Data Members
description:
Classes should have less than a defined number of Data Members.
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
Associated to each ABAP Class with violations, the Quality Rule provides:
- The number of class members
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, classes should not have too many Data Members.
remediation: Review the Class design to reduce the number of data members.
